alchemy_selectboxbox(object, method, values, options = {})

returns the html tags and javascript tag for the alchemy_selectbox form_builder method

[Source]

    # File lib/alchemy/form_builder.rb, line 9
 9:   def alchemy_selectboxbox(object, method, values, options = {})
10:     id = [object.class.to_s.underscore, method, 'select'].join('_')
11:     selected_value = values.detect(){ |v| v[1] == object.send(method) }
12:     nothing_selected = selected_value.blank?
13:     if nothing_selected
14:       if !options[:prompt].blank?
15:         select_box_content = options[:prompt]
16:       elsif !options[:include_blank?].blank?
17:         select_box_content = "&nbsp;"
18:       else
19:         select_box_content = values[0][0]
20:       end
21:     else
22:       select_box_content = selected_value[0]
23:     end
24:     html = Alchemy::ActionView.get_html_scaffold(:prefix, id, select_box_content, '', options)
25:     unless options[:prompt].blank? || nothing_selected
26:       html += %(<a href="#" rel="">#{options[:prompt]}</a>)
27:     end
28:     values.each do |value|
29:       selected = (selected_value[1] == value[1] rescue false)
30:       html += %(
31:         <a href="#" rel="#{value[1]}" title="#{value[0]}" class="#{selected ? 'selected' : nil}">#{value[0]}</a>
32:       )
33:     end
34:     html += Alchemy::ActionView.get_html_scaffold(:suffix, '', '', '')
35:     html += self.hidden_field(method, :value => (nothing_selected ? values[0][1] : selected_value[1]))
36:     html += Alchemy::ActionView.get_html_scaffold(:js, id, '', [object.class.to_s.underscore, method].join('_'))
37:     return html
38:   end
